job_tasks.phrase: You'll architect, develop, monitor and optimize our backend & frontend services;
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes core software engineering activities related to building, maintaining, and optimizing software services.

job_tasks.phrase: building integrations with various API's of our customers
job_tasks.justification: Integrating with external APIs is a standard software development task.
Integrating with contact center systems is a software integration task.

job_tasks.phrase: working on UI to make document-training & prompting accessible for our customers
job_tasks.justification: Developing user interfaces (UI) is a core software development task, even if the UI is for AI-related functionality.

job_tasks.phrase: You'll improve our code, and will be constantly looking for things that can help us write more maintainable and scalable services;
job_tasks.justification: Improving code quality, maintainability, and scalability are fundamental software engineering responsibilities.

job_tasks.phrase: Familiar with architecting complex software products;
job_tasks.justification: Architecting software products is a core software engineering task.

job_tasks.phrase: You take security and privacy seriously;
job_tasks.justification: Ensuring security and privacy is an integral part of responsible software development.

soft_skills.justification: Implies a willingness to consider new ideas and approaches.
Indicates taking initiative and driving tasks forward.
Suggests taking ownership and responsibility for one's work without constant supervision.

soft_skills.phrase: You take security and privacy seriously;
soft_skills.justification: Shows a commitment to responsible and ethical practices in development.

profile.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on traditional software engineering tasks such as architecting, developing, optimizing backend and frontend services, and integrating APIs. While the company's domain is AI/LLM and the product involves AI assistants, the specific responsibilities listed for the engineer are centered on building the software infrastructure and user interfaces that support these AI capabilities, rather than developing or fine-tuning the AI models themselves or performing advanced prompt engineering. This aligns with the definition of an AI-Adjacent Software Engineer who builds software that directly uses or supports AI/ML models.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is exceptionally clear and detailed, with a perfect alignment between the listed responsibilities and the defined profiles. The tasks are explicitly defined as software development, supporting an AI-focused product.
